problem.para: How many entries does a matrix of size (5,3) have?

answer.para: A matrix of size (5,3) has 15 entries.

problem.para: How many entries does a matrix of size (m,n) have?

answer.para: A matrix of size (m,n) has m\cdot n entries.

solution.para: A matrix of size (m,n) has m rows, each of which has n entries. So there are a total of m\cdot n entries.
